forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
Under a brilliant sun, Downtown San Francisco bathed in the warmth of a quintessential San Francisco day, unfolds with picturesque clarity. The temperature hovers gracefully near 66 degrees, tenderly dipping in the afternoon to a comfy 64, paired with a gentle west-southwest breeze whispering softly at 7 to 20 mph, providing just the right amount of refreshment as its playful gusts dance to 24 mph. There’s an invigorating absence of fog, revealing the majestic contours of the Golden Gate Bridge and the city’s iconic skyline unfettered, inviting gazes and wanderlust.

As the sun sets into the evening, the night promises to be mostly clear, with a soothing embrace of around 52 degrees. The southwest winds will continue their gentle serenade, perfect for those who might wander out for an evening stroll or a visit to a local café. With this blend of warmth and coolness, a light jacket or sweater will suffice, allowing one to appreciate the crisp air without compromising comfort. Today is an ideal canvas for a leisurely exploration of the city’s vibrant streets, perhaps sipping on coffee while gazing at the city’s landscape—or finding a quiet nook where you can soak in the peaceful rhythms of city life as it unwinds at dusk.
